COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!Responsibilities: Responsible for designing and building bridges and other highway-related structures. Typical tasks for bridge engineers include designing and maintaining bridge structures, minimizing environmental impact, and supervising the fabrication process. As well as completing site investigations, data collection, identifying environmental risks, analyzing manufacturing processes, supervising construction, and more.Bridge engineer duties and responsibilitiesThe duties and responsibilities of a bridge engineer are:Surveying the site of construction and assessing suitability
Estimating traffic load on the bridge
Designing various bridge components in keeping with expected traffic and soil strength
Preparing blueprints of the design
Creating the most functional and cost effective design
Preparing detailed estimation of the entire bridge project or a part of the bridge assigned to him or her
Communicating with contractors with regard to undertaking construction workSkills
Skills: The skills and specifications of a bridge engineer are:

Excellent knowledge about basic and advanced concepts of civil engineering
Thorough knowledge regarding safety standards
Good analysis skills
Good observation skills
Ability to work outdoors for long hours
